attributes.additional_details: Pen Farthing deserves recognition for the work he has done abroad and in service of his country.  He is a role model to millions and an example of the very best this country has to offer.
attributes.background: Knight Pen Farthing for his work with animals, humanitarian efforts and service to country.

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
